main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Pueblo, Colorado, in August 1956, with visual and radar confirmation indicating objects moving at high speeds.
interesting points: The first sighting involved objects moving at speeds estimated to be in excess of 1,000 mph, confirmed by radar., The second sighting featured a round object, size of a basketball, observed for over two hours, described as orange and green., Eyewitnesses described an object that glowed bright red and projected a silhouette against the night sky., The sightings generated a significant number of calls to telephone switchboards and newspapers., The objects remained untrackable by radar and were not identified as any known aircraft or balloon.
witness description: Eyewitnesses reported various features of the objects, including color, speed, and shape.
